name: Anvato Hidden Email
body:
## Here is the path to the instructions

curl  -A "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 4.1.1; Galaxy Nexus Build/JRO03C) AppleWebKit/535.19 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/18.0.1025.166 Mobile Safari/535.19" -e "http://www.anvato.com/candidates/Galina"  -X GET https://s3.amazonaws.com/anvato-resumes/candidates/2016_02/Galina_56c3a502af6fe -o mygettext.html

## And the output is
This document contains private instructions intended only for Galina (galina_abramova@yahoo.com). If you are not Galina, please report this to jobs@anvato.com.


Congratulations for finding the instructions!

We hope you'll send us your resume to our secret email address hashed below:
870c314a857891cc14266771baeb58c6ea3481be75c428229c1fed2f7e075b1e9e6a37342bcd099  3bd61d6e85d90ecbe3ec472bbad2633361af1f445e00a7d539132d8a06d0da61a622dffbf192879
54878cb6a7c13153375449138bd6bfafad7eb27b63a47a7981ebea8310f32144d6b4dfbeee6cf2b
16c40baa05d3d56dc882d493416e3db4ce57a9ad67edd74996148bc80d1cdbdb105e88b0c9e2a405
dbc72be38cb8df7e9e850e2b4d7c616db3b763174ea8bb628e79ee00ff13875327220f1aeb68 b08666712ac2eb56eba0fdf5df3fec192a0314d6fe0fd25b39d4d4e46a40e67348e437e6bf9d3
7bb32361031c1e505fa340eb76cdbe999dc1e7fc14d299dc49776c63bc8865829bbf5930d647587
8b07932502fae178c538a616a17290838ad1ceb5edfc08b43e0c059229a12ff68ac7a8094483884
00db1ed5efb05ef0425b5d3638e4d2a844d88d905e4503b04e78c74cb14b634ade29fe3ee8a06fe
f45a59c7376b1d1205c3632da0b74bf552659ae59b044b8fedb7fc8b25a48277eae943cdf084bc0
daea2e156670fb48f8ee3baf2859343731732b745557b9f2ccdb88413375c26b27f78c76f5126b7
f88a2b60347d232f822171b9ca6c04d

First, we generated a series of string prefixes with lengths increasing by 2. For example, if our secret email address was helloworld@anvato.com, we would generate:
he
hell
hellow
hellowor
...
helloworld@anvato.com

Then, for every prefix s, we computed the following hash J:
md5(md5(e) + s + md5(s))		[where + is the string concatenation operator and e is your email address].
Finally, we concatenated all hash strings J to form the long hash above!

For example, for helloworld@anvato.com,
we would compute:
md5(md5('galina_abramova@yahoo.com') + 'he' + md5('he')) + 
md5(md5('galina_abramova@yahoo.com') + 'hell' + md5('hell')) + 
md5(md5('galina_abramova@yahoo.com') + 'hellow' + md5('hellow')) + 
...

For the sake of simplicity, you can assume that our email address only contains alphanumeric characters and these 4 characters: _.@+

After solving the challenge, please email your resume and your solution to the secret email address that you decoded.

Good Luck!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
